summarization data folder

outputs/16.10.21
outputs of the "compute_scores" code on the rouge metric for ner and pos, for all candidates
each file is a dictionary (to load with pickle).
the filename if of the form:

rouge + mask_type + name_of_the_model + "result_dict.txt"

for example:
outputs/16.10.21/rouge_ner_5_base_result_dict.txt

The format of the dictionary is the same as for bleu, for example (result dictionary of one of the models for "pos"):

{'rouge_not_masked': 0.2680122184971558, 'rouge': {'NOUN': 0.059613944824945586, 'VERB': 0.03767341039767291, 'PUNCT': 0.0262667456705738, 'PROPN': 0.02870032801370964, 'INTJ': 0.0011292547518479412, 'NUM': 0.0052035128053247726, 'PRON': 0.0076416657849069924, 'SYM': 0.007656084106456351, 'SCONJ': 0.0021140601549134996, 'ADJ': 0.01018512236936786, 'ADP': 0.024874428828503103, 'ADV': 0.004240843408409578, 'AUX': 0.009427003255411792, 'X': -0.003150289284372554, 'CCONJ': 0.0015060034528069366, 'DET': 0.007517708545357382}, 'hallucination': {'NOUN': [0.20085321260665157, 0.7353299669162459, 0.06381682047710256], 'VERB': [0.2428359898963505, 0.6396655343611184, 0.11749847574253114], 'PUNCT': [0.23220191470844212, 0.642993907745866, 0.12480417754569191], 'PROPN': [0.2552422907488987, 0.6468722466960353, 0.09788546255506608], 'INTJ': [0.09090909090909091, 0.0, 0.9090909090909091], 'NUM': [0.21173469387755103, 0.5151785714285714, 0.27308673469387756], 'PRON': [0.23571345097580929, 0.5813953488372093, 0.1828912001869814], 'SYM': [0.129811320754717, 0.19622641509433963, 0.6739622641509434], 'SCONJ': [0.18786820859698888, 0.42461269910538946, 0.38751909229762166], 'ADJ': [0.23704478463440146, 0.5956071122943806, 0.16734810307121803], 'ADP': [0.16733694701870958, 0.7431369120475607, 0.08952614093372967], 'ADV': [0.2672138622891017, 0.4359325125398997, 0.2968536251709986], 'AUX': [0.2625604580001974, 0.5438752344289803, 0.19356430757082224], 'X': [0.07692307692307693, 0.0, 0.9230769230769231], 'CCONJ': [0.2225764381973627, 0.4451528763947254, 0.3322706854079119], 'DET': [0.15117150890346767, 0.7541705716963449, 0.09465791940018745]}}
